# Background:

The file containes analyses for Figures 1C and Figure 2 in the manuscript.  The HYDE 3.3 
(https://doi.org/10.24416/UU01-94FNH0) dataset is read in and processed to 3-class Anthromes (wildlands vs. cultured vs. intensive land areas)


# Fig 1C

```{r}
### make a plot 
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
### colnames and rownames 
colnames(anthromes_area_summary) <- c(seq(1900, 1950, by = 10), seq(1951, 2023, by = 1))
rownames(anthromes_area_summary) <- c("intensive","cultured","wild")

### add class variable -- used in melt later on
anthromes_area_summary$class <- as.factor(c("intensive","cultured","wild"))
```

```{r}
### make long
anthromes_summary_long <- reshape2::melt(anthromes_area_summary[1:11,], id.vars = "class", variable.name = "year", value.name = "area")

anthromes_summary_long$class <- factor(anthromes_summary_long$class, levels = rev(c("intensive","cultured","wild")))

anthromes_summary_long$area <- as.numeric(anthromes_summary_long$area)

```


```{r}
## subset dataset 
ds_4plotting <- anthromes_summary_long[anthromes_summary_long$class %in% c("intensive","cultured","wild"),]
ds_4plotting$area <- ds_4plotting$area/1000000 ### diivet to get ha *10^6
ds_4plotting$year <- as.numeric(levels(ds_4plotting$year))[ds_4plotting$year] 
```

```{r}
gg.anthrome_area2 <-  ggplot(aes(x = year, y = area, color = class, group = class, shape = class), data = ds_4plotting) + 
                      geom_hline(yintercept = 0, lty = 3, col = "gray") +  
                      geom_hline(yintercept = 20, lty = 3, col = "gray") +                    
                      geom_hline(yintercept = 40, lty = 3, col = "gray") +
                      geom_hline(yintercept = 60, lty = 3, col = "gray") +
                      geom_point(size = 1) +
                      geom_line() + 
                      theme_classic() + 
                      scale_color_manual(values = rev(c("#efcb68", "#70a0af", "#160c28")), 
                                         name = "3-class Anthrome") + 
                      scale_shape_manual(values = c(15, 16, 17), name = "3-class Anthrome") +
                      ylab(expression("area (ha × 10"^6*")")) + 
                      theme(legend.position = "top") #+ ylim(c(0,18))

# tiff(file = "anthrome_areas_2.16.2024.tiff", width = 25, height = 10, units = "cm", compression = "lzw", res = 600)
gg.anthrome_area2
# dev.off()
```

```{r}
### TWO CLASSIFICATIONS:
```

## population 
### compute summaries
```{r}
#### POPULATION SUMMARY
HYDE_3.3_popSumm  <- data.frame("year" = years,
                                "land_use" = rep(c(rep("total", length(years)), rep("urban", length(years)), rep("rural", length(years))), 6),
                                #### POPULATION
                                "global" = c(colSums(popc_r[!popc_r$region == "Total", as.character(years)]), 
                                             colSums(urbc_r[!urbc_r$region == "Total", as.character(years)]), 
                                             colSums(rurc_r[!rurc_r$region == "Total", as.character(years)])),
                                "global.lower" = c(colSums(popc_r_lower[!popc_r$region == "Total", as.character(years)]), 
                                                   colSums(urbc_r_lower[!urbc_r$region == "Total", as.character(years)]), 
                                                   colSums(rurc_r_lower[!rurc_r$region == "Total", as.character(years)])),
                                "tropical" = c(colSums(popc_r[popc_r$region %in% tropical, as.character(years)]), 
                                               colSums(urbc_r[urbc_r$region %in% tropical, as.character(years)]), 
                                               colSums(rurc_r[rurc_r$region %in% tropical, as.character(years)])),
                                "tropical.lower" = c(colSums(popc_r_lower[popc_r_lower$region %in% tropical, as.character(years)]), 
                                                     colSums(urbc_r_lower[urbc_r_lower$region %in% tropical, as.character(years)]), 
                                                     colSums(rurc_r_lower[rurc_r_lower$region %in% tropical, as.character(years)])),
                                "temperate" = c(colSums(popc_r[popc_r$region %in% temperate, as.character(years)]),
                                                colSums(urbc_r[urbc_r$region %in% temperate, as.character(years)]),  
                                                colSums(rurc_r[rurc_r$region %in% temperate, as.character(years)])), 
                                "temperate.lower" = c(colSums(popc_r_lower[popc_r$region %in% temperate, as.character(years)]),
                                                      colSums(urbc_r_lower[urbc_r$region %in% temperate, as.character(years)]),  
                                                      colSums(rurc_r_lower[rurc_r$region %in% temperate, as.character(years)])))
                          
## reshape to long 
popSumm_long <- reshape2::melt(HYDE_3.3_popSumm[,c("year", "land_use", "global", "tropical", "temperate")], id.vars = c("land_use","year"))
popSumm_long$land_use <- factor(popSumm_long$land_use, levels = c("total", "urban", "rural"))
        
### for lower
popSumm_long_lower <- reshape2::melt(HYDE_3.3_popSumm[,c("year", "land_use", "global.lower", "tropical.lower", "temperate.lower")], id.vars = c("land_use","year"))
popSumm_long_lower$land_use <- factor(popSumm_long_lower$land_use, levels = c("total", "urban", "rural"))


### add lower to popSumm_long
popSumm_long$lower <-  popSumm_long_lower$value
popSumm_long$diff <-  popSumm_long$value - popSumm_long$lower
```

### plotting 
```{r}

###############
library(ggplot2)                                

gg_pop <- ggplot(aes(x = year, y = value), data = popSumm_long) + 
          geom_hline(yintercept = 0, lty = 3) +
          geom_hline(yintercept = 2e9, lty = 3) +
          geom_hline(yintercept = 4e9, lty = 3) +
          geom_hline(yintercept = 6e9, lty = 3) +
          geom_hline(yintercept = 8e9, lty = 3) +
          geom_ribbon(aes(ymin = value + diff, ymax = value - diff, fill = variable), alpha = 0.5, color = NA) +
          geom_line(aes(color = variable)) + theme_classic() +
          facet_wrap(vars(land_use)) + ylab("population") + theme(legend.position = c(0.9,0.75)) +
          scale_color_manual(values = c("#4c5b5c", "#3772ff", "#df2935"), name = NULL) +
          scale_fill_manual(values = c("#4c5b5c", "#3772ff", "#df2935"), name = NULL) +
          scale_y_continuous(labels = label_number(scale_cut = cut_short_scale(space = TRUE)))
            
gg_pop
```

```{r}
landSumm_long$land_type <- factor(landSumm_long$land_type, levels = c("cropland", "rainfed area", "rangeland"))

## reshape to long 
landSumm_long_lower <- reshape2::melt(HYDE_3.3_land_Summary[,c("year", "land_type", "global.lower", "tropical.lower", "temperate.lower")],

landSumm_long_lower$land_type <- factor(HYDE_3.3_land_Summary$land_type, levels = c("cropland", "rainfed area", "rangeland"))
```

```{r}
landSumm_long2C <- reshape2::melt(HYDE_3.3_land_SummaryC[,c("year", "land_type", "global", "tropical", "temperate")], id.vars = c("land_type", "year"))
landSumm_long2C$land_type <- factor(landSumm_long2C$land_type , levels = c("built up area", "total rice area", "rainfed - no rice", 
                                                                           "rainfed - rice", "irrigated - rice", "irrigated - no rice"))


landSumm_long2C_lower <- reshape2::melt(HYDE_3.3_land_SummaryC[,c("year", "land_type", "global.lower", "tropical.lower", "temperate.lower")], 
                                        id.vars = c("land_type", "year"))
landSumm_long2C_lower$land_type <- factor(landSumm_long2C$land_type , levels = c("built up area", "total rice area", "rainfed - no rice", 
                                                                                 "rainfed - rice", "irrigated - rice", "irrigated - no rice"))


### add lower to landSumm_long2C
landSumm_long2C$lower <- landSumm_long2C_lower$value
landSumm_long2C$diff <- landSumm_long2C$value - landSumm_long2C$lower


gg_land4 <- ggplot(aes(x = year, y = value), data = landSumm_long2C) + 
            geom_ribbon(aes(ymin = value + diff, ymax = value - diff, fill = variable), alpha = 0.5, color = NA) +
            geom_line(aes(color = variable)) + theme_classic() +
            facet_wrap(vars(land_type)) + ylab("land area (ha)") + theme(legend.position = "top") +
            scale_color_manual(values = c("#4c5b5c", "#3772ff", "#df2935"), name = NULL) +
            scale_fill_manual(values = c("#4c5b5c", "#3772ff", "#df2935"), name = NULL) 

# tiff(filename = "HYDE3.3_LandClass4_sameScale.tiff", width = 18, height = 12, compression = "lzw", res = 600, units = "cm")
gg_land4
# dev.off()
```

## Land Summary XX
### computing summaries 
```{r}
#################################


HYDE_3.3_land_SummaryX <- data.frame("year" = years,
                                     "land_type" = rep(c(rep("built up area", length(years)), rep("irrigated area", length(years)), 
                                                         rep("rainfed area", length(years)), rep("cropland", length(years)),
                                                         rep("rangeland", length(years)), rep("pastureland", length(years))), 3),
                                     "global" = c(colSums(uopp_r[as.character(years)]), 
                                                  colSums(tot_irri_r[as.character(years)]),
                                                  colSums(tot_rainfed_r[as.character(years)]),
                                                  colSums(cropland_r[as.character(years)]),
                                                  colSums(rangeland_r[as.character(years)]), 
                                                  colSums(pasture_r[as.character(years)])),
                                     "tropical" = c(colSums(uopp_r[uopp_r$region %in% tropical, as.character(years)]), 
                                                    colSums(tot_irri_r[tot_irri_r$region %in% tropical, as.character(years)]), 
                                                    colSums(tot_rainfed_r[tot_rainfed_r$region %in% tropical, as.character(years)]), 
                                                    colSums(cropland_r[cropland_r$region %in% tropical, as.character(years)]), 
                                                    colSums(rangeland_r[rangeland_r$region %in% tropical, as.character(years)]), 
                                                    colSums(pasture_r[pasture_r$region %in% tropical, as.character(years)])),
                                     "temperate" = c(colSums(uopp_r[uopp_r$region %in% temperate, as.character(years)]),
                                                     colSums(tot_irri_r[tot_irri_r$region %in% temperate, as.character(years)]),  
                                                     colSums(tot_rainfed_r[tot_rainfed_r$region %in% temperate, as.character(years)]), 
                                                     colSums(cropland_r[cropland_r$region %in% temperate, as.character(years)]),
                                                     colSums(rangeland_r[rangeland_r$region %in% temperate, as.character(years)]),
                                                     colSums(pasture_r[pasture_r$region %in% temperate, as.character(years)])))


landSumm_longX <- reshape2::melt(HYDE_3.3_land_SummaryX, id.vars = c("land_type", "year"))
landSumm_longX$land_type <- factor(landSumm_longX$land_type , levels = c("built up area", "irrigated area", "rainfed area", 
                                                                         "cropland", "rangeland", "pastureland"))

```
